tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="5" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-07-17 04:43:37" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2021-06-14 00:37:26" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__FSRM:DEFAULT_QUOTA" value="0" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__FSRM:APPLY_QUOTA_TO_ALL_SERVICES" value="false" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION" value="45:1000" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION_UPDATE" value="2023-05-12 13:27:01" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_mail_templates.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCAGH:InstallUserTemplateId" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCAGH:InstallAdminTemplateId" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCAGH:ReinstallUserTemplateId" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCAGH:ReinstallAdminTemplateId" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="5" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-07-17 04:43:38" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2021-06-14 00:37:28" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
[Configuration] BasedOn=..\Engine\Config\BaseGame.ini
[Engine.AccessControl] ; if left blank then no player may login as admin AdminPassword=$[RConPassword] ; Password required to enter the game GamePassword=$[PrivatePassword]
[AAGame.AAAccessControl] ; 5 minute ban time VoteKickBanTime=300 ROEKickBanTime=600
[Engine.GameInfo] DefaultGame=AAGame.AAGameDevelopment DefaultServerGame=AAGame.AAGameDevelopment GameDifficulty=+1.0 ;This is the number of spectators in addition to the number of players MaxSpectators=8 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] ;Time limit no longer has any affect TimeLimit=0 ;Time in seconds before a player will be moved to spectator team for being idle MaxIdleTime=61 ;If set to false then players will not be kicked for being idle bKickLiveIdlers=true bAdminCanPause=true
[Engine.GameReplicationInfo] ;The name of the server as displayed on the server info screen as well as the scoreboard ServerName="$[HostName]"
[AAGame.AAGameInfo] GameplayEventsWriterClassName=Engine.GameplayEventsWriter bLogGameplayEvents=false GameSettingsUpdateInterval=20.0 bAutoDemoRecEnabled=false DemoRecDir= TimeToSelfKill=20.0 InitialConnectionKillTimeout=90.0 AAMaxPlayersAllowed=32
;This list determines which maps the server will rotate through [AAGame.AADataStore_OnlineGameSearch] +MapRotationList="BDX_Breach_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_Crossfire_C4" +MapRotationList="BDX_Lockdown_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_Springstreet_VIP" +MapRotationList="BDX_Hydra_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_InnerHospital_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_Watchdog_C4" +MapRotationList="BDX_Intercept_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_Raptus_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_Furious_TH" +MapRotationList="BDX_Shadowstep_EX" +MapRotationList="BDX_Springstreet_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_Uptown_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_InsurgentCamp_AC" +MapRotationList="FLO_Sandstorm_TH" +MapRotationList="FLO_InnerHospital_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_StoneRuins_C4" +MapRotationList="FLO_Intercept_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_Checkout_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_Homestead_C4" +MapRotationList="FLO_InnerHospital_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_InsurgentCamp_AC" +MapRotationList="FLO_Sandstorm_TH" +MapRotationList="FLO_Uptown_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_CabinFever_TH" +MapRotationList="FLO_Homestead_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_Intercept_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_Watchdog_C4" +MapRotationList="FLO_Slums_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_RockyRoad_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_Overload_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_Raptus_EX" +MapRotationList="FLO_ColdFront_C4" +MapRotationList="FLO_Redline_VIP" +MapRotationList="FLO_Rusneyev_EX"
;This is the list of possible maps player can vote to. Please keep it in alphabetical order +MapVoteList="BDX_Breach_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Bridge_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Checkout_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Crossfire_C4" +MapVoteList="BDX_Crossfire_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Furious_TH" +MapVoteList="BDX_Hydra_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_InnerHospital_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_InnerHospital_VIP" +MapVoteList="BDX_Intercept_C4" +MapVoteList="BDX_Intercept_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Lockdown_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_OuterHospital_C4" +MapVoteList="BDX_Raptus_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Reaction_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Redline_C4" +MapVoteList="BDX_Redline_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Rusneyev_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Shadowstep_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Siege_C4" +MapVoteList="BDX_Siege_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_Springstreet_EX" +MapVoteList="BDX_SpringStreet_VIP" +MapVoteList="BDX_Watchdog_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Bridge_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_BridgeNight_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_CabinFever_TH" +MapVoteList="FLO_Checkout_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_ColdFront_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_ColdFront_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Downtown_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Furious_TH" +MapVoteList="FLO_HarborAssault_TH" +MapVoteList="FLO_HarborAssaultNight_TH" +MapVoteList="FLO_Homestead_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Homestead_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_Hospital_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_InnerHospital_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_InnerHospital_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_InsurgentCamp_AC" +MapVoteList="FLO_Intercept_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Intercept_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Intercept_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_Overload_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Overload_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_Raptus_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Reaction_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Redline_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Redline_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_RedLine_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_RockyRoad_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Rusneyev_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Sandstorm_TH" +MapVoteList="FLO_Slums_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Slums_TH" +MapVoteList="FLO_Slums_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_StoneRuins_C4" +MapVoteList="FLO_Uptown_EX" +MapVoteList="FLO_Uptown_VIP" +MapVoteList="FLO_Watchdog_AC" +MapVoteList="FLO_Watchdog_C4"
;List of training maps +TrainingMapList="STX_Tutorial" +TrainingMapList="STX_Giunta_Range" +TrainingMapList="STX_Swenson_Range"
;List of Shoot houses in alphabetical order +ShoothouseMapList="SH_870MCS" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M4" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M9" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M14" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M16" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M24" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M67" +ShoothouseMapList="SH_M249"
[AAGame.AAGameMultiplayerBase] ; Minimum number of players to wait for before starting the match MinNetPlayers=2 ; Time after MinNetPlayers join to wait for more players NetWait=60 ;Time spent in weapon selection and communication BeginningOfRoundDelay=12 ;Extra time spent in weapon selection and communication for swap round SwapRoundDelay=6 ; False - match ends early if one team wins over half the rounds ; True - match will be played for all rounds, regardless of team score bPlayAllRounds=false ; Time spent (in seconds) in WarmUpMode before the server triggers another UGC Maps Update ServerNeedsUGCMapsUpdateDelay=600 ; A flag indicating that the server should auto-update UGC maps bServerSteamUGCAutoUpdate=true
[AAGame.AAGamePVPBase] bScaleWithNumPlayers=true ; These override MaxPlayers in production maps MaxTeamSizeBDX=6 MaxTeamSizeFLO=12 ; If > 0, these override the map TimeLimits TimeLimitOverrideBDX=180 TimeLimitOverrideFLO=240 ; Maximum number of rounds per match RoundsPerMatchBDX=15 RoundsPerMatchFLO=15
[AAGame.AAGameReplicationInfo] ;Time in seconds before a flash or frag grenade may be thrown ForbidGrenadeTimeFLO=0 ForbidGrenadeTimeBDX=0 ;If true, then players must use autopick to choose their team bDefaultOnlyAllowAutoPick=false ;Refers to aim assist when using a controller bDefaultAllowControllerAimAssist=true bOnlineVoiceEnabled=true ;The server owner name, website and hosting company and admin name and email, if filled out, appear on the Server Info screen sDefaultServerOwnerName= sDefaultServerOwnerWebsite= sDefaultServerHostingCompany= sDefaultAdminName= sDefaultAdminEmail= ;The message of the day is displayed on the team select screen (first screen seen when joining a game) and on the server info screen sDefaultServerMOTD="Visit the forums! forum.americasarmy.com" ;The admin message is displayed on the server info screen sDefaultAdminMessage="Welcome to AA Proving Grounds!" ;toggles Kick Player voting bDefaultAllowKickPlayerVoting=false ;toggles Change Map voting bDefaultAllowChangeMapVoting=true ;toggles Set Next Map voting bDefaultAllowSetNextMapVoting=true ;toggles Restart Mission voting bDefaultAllowRestartMissionVoting=true ;toggles Scramble Teams voting bDefaultAllowScrambleTeamsVoting=true ;If NumberOfVotes >= NumberOfVoters / VoteKickRate, the vote to kick a player will be passed. DefaultVoteKickRate=2.25 DefaultVoteDuration=15 ;When true players may vote for the next map at the end of a match bDefaultAllowAARMapVoting=true ;When true hard core mode is enabled - NOTE - this feature is no longer officially supported any may not work as expected ;Hard core = Reduced HUD and no revives bDefaultHardcoreMode=false ;If true then teams will attempt to balance numbers at the start of each round bDefaultAutoBalanceTeams=true ;When true friendly fire damage is reduced bDefaultReduceFriendlyFire=true ;When true players are punished for ROE violations (ROE = dealing large amount of damage to friendlies) bDefaultROEEnabled=true ;When false players bleed to 1% and then stop bleeding bDefaultAllowBleedOut=true ;When false disables the minimap dot for enemies that have fired recently bDefaultAllowEnemyFireMapDot=true ;When true weapons will reload automatically once the current magazine is expended bDefaultAutoReloadEnabled=true ;When false players cannot be revived following a head shot bDefaultReviveOnHeadshots=true ;The number of times a player may be revived MaxRevives=1 ;When false all character shadows for all clients are forced off bDefaultShadowsAllowed=true ;When true anchoring is allowed bDefaultAnchoringAllowed=true ;When true the minimal HUD option is forced on for all clients - NOTE - this feature is no longer officially supported any may not work as expected bHUD_ForceMinimalHUD=false ;When false the active players for each team is not displayed on the HUD and only friendlies are displayed on the scoreboard ;NOTE - this feature is no longer officially supported any may not work as expected bDefaultHUD_ForcePlayerCountOff=true ;When false enemy spots only appear on the minimap - NOTE - this feature is no longer officially supported any may not work as expected bDefaultHUD_ForceInWorldEnemySpots=true ;When true the messages for when a player kills another are turned off for all clients - NOTE- this feature is no longer officially supported any may not work as expected bDefaultHUD_ForceActivityFeedOff=false ;No longer used bHUD_ForceHitIndicatorOff=true bAllowAdminSpectate=true bAllowSpectateMode_ActionCam=true bAllowSpectateMode_3pOrbit=true bAllowSpectateMode_FreeCam=true ;When true, players on the spectate team experience suppression, flash grenades and other screen FX bDefaultForceSpectateTeamScreenFX=false ;When false, prevents spectators from seeing occluded mesh outlines bDefaultAllowOccludedMeshSpectate=true ;When true, will use the roles setup as dictated by the map bDefaultUseRoles=true ;When true, the server will do hit detection instead of the client bDefaultUseServerSideHitDetection=false ;When true, the server will allow global VoIP for all players bDefaultAllowGlobalVoiceChat=true ;When true, the server will allow VoIP for all spectators bDefaultAllowSpectatorVoiceChat=true ;When true, the server will allow text chat for all players bDefaultAllowGlobalTextChat=true ;Time that must pass before prone can be attempted again ProneRetryTimer=1.0 ;Allows RPG pickups to be used bAllowRPGPickup=true ;Whether or not AAU-related systems should be called bEnableAAUDatabaseService=true ;Whether or not AWS-related systems should be called bEnableAWSServiceServer=true bEnableAWSServiceClient=true ;See Kartigan bDefaultAllowSpecial=false
[Engine.WorldInfo] bShowLightingRebuildMessage=TRUE DecalManagerClassPath=AAGame.AADecalManager
[DefaultPlayer] Name=Player team=255
[Engine.PlayerController] ForceFeedbackManagerClassName="WinDrv.XnaForceFeedbackManager"
[Engine.DecalManager] ;The time in seconds bullet decals and grenade scorch marks hang around DecalLifeSpan=30.0
[AAGame.AAPlayerController] ;How many times a player can hit friendlies before incurring an ROE violation FriendlyFireHitLimit=4 ;These are all client-side settings bPunkbusterMsgs=false bHoldToSprint=false bDoubleTapSprint=false bGrenadesInWeaponCycle=false fMasterVolume=1.f fMusicVolume=0.8f fUIVolume=0.8.f fSoundEffectsVolume=100.f fVOVolume=100.f bMuteWhenFocusLost=true bMuteVOIPWhenFocusLost=false bVOIPEnabled=true ;This refers to the music which plays at the 30 second mark in a round bRoundEndWarningMusic=true Audio_VoiceSelection=255 bDisplayNumPing=true bCameraBob=false sNonAuthSoldierName=DidNotSetName VIPProbabilityRank=VPROB_Normal bParentalLock_Violence=false bParentalLock_VOIP=false bParentalLock_Chat=false bUseDualRenderScopes=false GameSettingsUpdateInterval=15 ;Is actually the cosine of the angle between the view and target. ;This should be a large enough area that it has a target before the aim assist ;systems activate on it. AimAssistTargetAngle=.94 AimAssistTargetAngleLarge=.9 ;How often to check for a new aim assist target. Also, if framerate is not ;above this value it will skip aim assist target checks AimAssistTargetSearchTime=0.1f ;Softening angle for aim adhesion. When within this radius, the strength will ;fade out of the aim adhesion system. This will scale with distance. The ;value here is for a close range target. AimAdhesionSoftenAngle=0.99993 AimAdhesionMinSoftenAngleStrength=0.75 ;ConfigStrength * this value of change is the max change per frame for aim adhesion AimAdhesionInterpSpeed=0.001 AimSnapDelay=2 bSwitchToWeaponOnPickup=true PawnCamoIdx[0]=-1 PawnCamoIdx[1]=-1 PawnCamoIdx[2]=-1 PawnCamoIdx[3]=-1 PawnCamoIdx[4]=-1 HeadPreference[0]=HEAD_Random HeadPreference[1]=HEAD_Random HeadPreference[2]=HEAD_Random HeadPreference[3]=HEAD_Random HeadPreference[4]=HEAD_Random BadgePreference=0 GearPreference[0]=0 GearPreference[1]=0 GearPreference[2]=0 GearPreference[3]=0 GearPreference[4]=0 bShowOccludedMeshes=true ; the window to open if the bug report method is one of AAPC_RM_SteamOverlay or AAPC_RM_DefaultBrowser BugReportURL="http://bugreport.americasarmy.com/" ; one of AAPC_RM_SteamOverlay, AAPC_RM_DefaultBrowser, AAPC_RM_ExternalApplication (the last one is not implemented) BugReportMethod=AAPC_RM_DefaultBrowser ; the window to open if the commend/report player method is one of AAPC_RM_SteamOverlay or AAPC_RM_DefaultBrowser CommendOrReportPlayerURL="http://www.americasarmy.com/support/abuse" ; one of AAPC_RM_SteamOverlay, AAPC_RM_DefaultBrowser, AAPC_RM_ExternalApplication (the last one is not implemented) CommendOrReportPlayerMethod=AAPC_RM_DefaultBrowser PlayerInfoURL="https://my.goarmy.com/info/form/GetBrcFormRedirectByUrl.action?url=/info/send1" fSafeArea=1.0 bAdminIncognito=True ; Weapon to force at startup ; Primaries: ak105,ak107,czalpha,m4a1,m16a4,scarh,mp7a1,m870,supernova,m249,rpk,dragunov,m14ebr,m24,sv98,rpg7 ; Sidearms: cz2,m9,m17,m1911 AdminForcedWeapon= ;Classes to force: rifleman,autorifleman,marksman,sniper AdminForcedRole=
[AAGame.AAPawn] ; Pawn relative speed indicates target pawn is moving, for aim adhesion AimAdhesionRelativeVelocity=0.005
; Low speed is for bHighAnim targets, when the target is moving AimAdhesionInterpSpeedLow=1.5 ; High speed is for all other cases AimAdhesionInterpSpeedHigh=15
; Range 0 to 1, where 1 is 100%; if not 0, aim adhesion will function when ; the player's pawn is not moving or rotating ; if zero, aim snap will not function unless player's pawn is moving AimAdhesionNonMovingStrengthModifier=0.001
; When running, modifies the strength of aim adhesion AimAdhesionRunningStrengthModifier=0.25
; When running, modifies the strength of aim friction AimFrictionRunningStrengthModifier=0.25
; Aim friction distance modifiers , where aim friction is max strength up to ; the min and is at min strength at the max distance. AimFrictionMinDistance=500 AimFrictionMaxDistance=3000
; Modifies the AimFriction max speed by adding: (GamepadSensitivity * this) ; for the lower axis curve, and twice that amount for the higher axis curve ; **Compensates for differing gamepad sensitivity levels AimFrictionGamepadSensitivityMod=0.05
; Reduces the gamepad axis speed by a percentage, depending on if the axis is ; using the low speed (inner area), or high speed (outer edges). Recommend ; the high speed be twice the low speed. This value also has the above value ; added to it. Example: At 1 GamepadSensitivity the friction strength is ; (1 * 0.05) + 0.25 = 0.3 or at high speed: 0.05 + 0.05 + 0.50 = 0.6 AimFrictionMaxStrength[0]=0.25 AimFrictionMaxStrength[1]=0.50
; Range 0 to 2, where 2 indicates Right and Up axis are at 100% ; When the combined value of the Right and Up axis's are below this value ; it will scale the strength of aim adhesion by the distance of ; 0 to <specified value>. This is for lightening up aim adhesion for minor ; aim corrections AimAdhesionRawJoyMin=0.5
; Sets aim snap to target the aim assist bone target instead of the center ; position of the target pawn AimSnapTargetBones=true
+SightCheckBones=Head +SightCheckBones=L_Shoulder +SightCheckBones=R_Shoulder +SightCheckBones=Pelvis +SightCheckBones=L_Knee +SightCheckBones=R_Knee
; Bone names for AimAssist to check for target aquisition ; this list MUST match AimAssistTargetPoints, minus the extra information ; of bHighAnim, bValidBulletMag, and BoneOffsets. It is used for threaded ; checking of targets, so it cannot be a struct. +AimAssistCheckBones=Right_Eye +AimAssistCheckBones=Left_Eye +AimAssistCheckBones=BackSling +AimAssistCheckBones=ChestSling +AimAssistCheckBones=Spine2 +AimAssistCheckBones=L_Wrist +AimAssistCheckBones=R_Wrist +AimAssistCheckBones=L_Shoulder +AimAssistCheckBones=R_Shoulder +AimAssistCheckBones=L_Elbow +AimAssistCheckBones=R_Elbow +AimAssistCheckBones=Pelvis +AimAssistCheckBones=L_Knee +AimAssistCheckBones=R_Knee +AimAssistCheckBones=L_Ankle +AimAssistCheckBones=R_Ankle +AimAssistCheckBones=L_Toe +AimAssistCheckBones=R_Toe
; bHighAnim indicates the target point has a lot of translation when animating ; bValidBulletMag indicates availability of the target for bullet magnetism +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=Right_Eye, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=false, BoneOffset=(X=-3.000000,Y=0.000000,Z=0.000000)) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=Left_Eye, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=false, BoneOffset=(X=-3.000000,Y=0.000000,Z=0.000000)) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=BackSling, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true, BoneOffset=(X=4.000000,Y=0.000000,Z=0.000000)) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=ChestSling, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=Spine2, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=L_Wrist, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=R_Wrist, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=L_Shoulder, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=R_Shoulder, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=L_Elbow, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=R_Elbow, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=Pelvis, bHighAnim=false, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=L_Knee, bHighAnim=true, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=R_Knee, bHighAnim=true, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=L_Ankle, bHighAnim=true, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=R_Ankle, bHighAnim=true, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=L_Toe, bHighAnim=true, bValidBulletMag=true) +AimAssistTargetPoints=(BoneName=R_Toe, bHighAnim=true, bValidBulletMag=true)
[Engine.AutoTestManager] bExitOnCyclesComplete=true NumAutomatedMapTestingCycles=1 +AutomatedMapTestingList=BDX_Breach_EX_Benchmark +AutomatedMapTestingList=BDX_Lockdown_EX_Benchmark +AutomatedMapTestingList=BDX_Siege_EX_Benchmark +AutomatedMapTestingList=FLO_ColdFront_Benchmark +AutomatedMapTestingList=FLO_Downtown_EX_Benchmark +AutomatedMapTestingList=FLO_Hospital_EX_Benchmark +AutomatedMapTestingList=FLO_Slums_Benchmark
; This allows enable/disabling kicking players that haven't first logged into their AAU account ; on authorized (non LAN) servers. [AAGame.AASteamClientAuthentication] bKickIfNoAAUAccount=true
[AAGame.AASteamServerAuthentication] bDisableMBSUpdatingMessage=true
[AAGame.AAOnlineGameSearch] AutoCreateOnlineGameFallback=true ShortTimer=0.001 SearchWaitTime=1.5 SearchRetryTime=3.5 CancelFinalizeTime=3.0 HostWaitPhaseTime=30 PartyLeaderTime=2.0 SonyQueriesMax=2 SearchRoundMax=3 +MaxPingPerRound=60 +MaxPingPerRound=100 +MaxPingPerRound=140 +MaxPingPerRound=200
[AAGame.AAPrivateGameSettings] RoundCount=6 FriendlyFire=true MaxRevives=1 UseRoles=true AllowAimAssist=true AllowSpectator=false UseDedicatedServer=true

At a certain distance, it will also effect the strength.
